invention-title: Low-temperature ammonia catalytic combustion reaction device
一种低温氨催化燃烧反应装置

abstract.p: The invention belongs to the field of ammonia catalytic combustion, and particularly relates to a low-temperature ammonia catalytic combustion reaction device. The device comprises a gas inlet module, an ignition module, a reaction module, a detection module and a tail gas treatment module, and gas pipelines are all phi 4 stainless steel pipe gas pipelines and are connected in a sealed mode through stainless steel clamping sleeve connectors to achieve the purpose of being easy to detach. Wherein the ignition module can utilize hydrogen catalytic combustion to enable the temperature in a U-shaped reaction tube to reach the ignition temperature of ammonia catalytic combustion, so that the problem of cold start of ammonia catalytic combustion is solved, the energy consumption is reduced, and low-temperature ammonia catalytic combustion is realized; by using a catalyst in the reaction module, the ignition temperature of ammonia combustion can be greatly reduced, the ammonia catalytic combustion reaction efficiency is improved, the generation of a by-product nitrogen oxide is reduced, and meanwhile, a U-shaped reaction tube provides a quasi-adiabatic condition through a heat preservation shell; and the detection module can realize real-time product analysis. While ammonia catalytic combustion efficiency detection and reaction temperature monitoring are achieved, the influence relation of parameters such as the flow, the fuel-air ratio, the temperature and the catalyst filling amount on the ammonia catalytic combustion efficiency can be effectively provided, and scientific data support is provided for future scenarized application of ammonia catalytic combustion.

本发明属于氨催化燃烧领域，具体涉及一种低温氨催化燃烧反应装置。该装置包括：进气模块、点火模块、反应模块、检测模块和尾气处理模块，气体管道均采用Φ4不锈钢管气体管道，且由不锈钢卡套接头密封连接达到易拆卸的目的。其中，点火模块可以利用氢气催化燃烧使U型反应管内温度达到氨催化燃烧的起燃温度，解决氨催化燃烧冷启动问题，降低能耗，实现低温氨催化燃烧；反应模块中催化剂的使用能够大幅降低氨燃烧的起燃温度，提高氨催化燃烧反应效率，降低副产物氮氧化物生成，同时U型反应管由保温外壳提供准绝热条件；检测模块能够实现产物实时分析。本发明在实现氨催化燃烧效率检测和反应温度监测的同时，可以有效地提供流量、燃空比、温度、催化剂填充量等参数对氨催化燃烧效率的影响关系，为未来氨催化燃烧场景化应用提供科学的数据支撑。
